com.nexacro.xapi.tx
Interface DataSerializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
MiBinaryDataSerializer, MiXmlDataSerializer, PlatformBinaryDataSerializer, PlatformHtmlDataSerializer, PlatformSsvDataSerializer, PlatformSsvExtDataSerializer, PlatformXmlDataSerializer
public interface DataSerializer

PlatformData를 특정 형식으로 변환하여 OutputStream 또는 Writer으로 출력한다.

Author:
Choi, Jongkwan
